website_summaries.verdict: Primer that prevents feathering and locks in color.
pros: Vitamin E enriched formula pampers lips
Prolongs the staying power of even cheaper brand lipsticks
Prevents lip glosses and lipsticks from fading or feathering

website_summaries.verdict: Easy to apply, this is the perfect companion for liquid lip products.
pros: Effectively prevents liquid lipsticks from bleeding and feathering
Keeps creamy lip products locked in place for hours
Primer is easy to apply, and a little product goes a long way
Works well under lip gloss as well
cons: Formula can be drying with extended use
Always exfoliate and hydrate lips between uses

customer_reviews.title: Amazing must have
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I put it on my lips lightly End it will last all day. My lipstick does not come off. My lipstick also does not run into the lines over my lips. I have tried many many things and this is the best I’ve ever had. You won’t be disappointed, especially if you’re a bit on the older side with some of those deeper lines above your lip line.
customer_reviews.author: Gregk

customer_reviews.title: Turns your lipstick to clay
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. When applied to clean lips as directed before lipstick, it dries to a film that peels and flakes. I was so disappointed to have my lipstick feel like clay on my lips and embarrassed to find chunky remnants of it on my glass, fork, etc. I didn’t expect the lipstick to be bulletproof, but while it’s bad enough to leave lipstick rings on glasses, chunks are just disgusting. I decided to test the product again by applying it to clean, exfoliated lips and leaving it about 3-5 minutes. When I looked in the mirror, I could already see it lifting, flaking and clumping with no lipstick applied. Going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: CFuller

customer_reviews.title: Easily applied with wand and stays on well
customer_reviews.text: Works best if you'll let it dry a couple of minutes before applying colored liner, etc. Also, be careful not to apply it beyond where the color will be because it dries to a hard white crust that looks like some sort of milk line. Just be sure to take one last careful look in mirror before heading out for the day. It is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gardenbees

customer_reviews.title: Helps improve lipstick coverage
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to help me keep my dark lipstick on my whole lips, as I had been getting a visible light line of the back of my bottom lip where it was too wet to put lipstick on. I put this lip primer on and it dried the area up enough to get the lipstick to stay on there - getting rid of that weird visible line. The lipstick didn't quite last on there all day, but it did last perfectly for multiple hours, which is significantly longer than the 30 minutes or so that it was lasting before. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Clover

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work as well as promised
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived promptly and well-packaged.However, it doesn't prevent the lipstick from transferring and leaves an unpleasantly dry layer upon application. Perhaps it works for some, but given its price I am really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elzbieta Sklodowska

customer_reviews.title: This product is not as I expected because it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as I expected because it doesn't keep my lipstick from bleeding entirely and it has to be reapplied more than once. I'm really looking for something that completely keeps my lipstick from bleeding and only has to be applied once during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte K. Beall

customer_reviews.title: Needs better applicator wand.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the applicator was better. Design of bottle leads you to leave a lot along the sides of the bottle that can't be reached. You really have to dig around to use up all of the product. I do like the way it holds my lip color. There's no need to apply a large amount on your lips. Apply, then let dry before adding liner.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte, NC

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lip primer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lip primer! Give it plenty of time to dry, though, before applying lip colour. It lasts well and really prevents the bleeding of colour into fine lines around lips, which is the main reason I use lip primers. It does seem to help with the feathering & peeling issues, too. The only thing I see as a con is that I can feel it more than the previous lip primer that I was using. However, it does a better job than that one did. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: brigitte yvette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little primer
customer_reviews.text: The best lip primer I have ever found! My lipstick lasts ALL day! And no feathering!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without this. Extends lip color. Product lasts a long time too.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Ahrenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product does help lipstick to stay on longer. You have to let it dry a little after application before putting on the lipstick. It can leave blotches on the inner lining of the lip, so after lipstick application you have to ensure you gently wipe the inner lip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Really good stuff. I have used this for a while and it performs exactly as indicated. Keeps lipstick in place
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to get use to it but I absolutely love it. I have tried many brands and this is the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Go Vols

customer_reviews.title: This didn't help with feathering or longer lasting color
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this was an authentic Too Faced product, but it's not worth the money. I didn't see any longer lasting effects with this primer nor did it prevent feather. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: talltreesinc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer! My lipstick actually stays on, even on the slick inner portion of my bottom lip. I've tried so many other primers, but this is the only one that has worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It makes my lipstick go on so smooth. I also use an exfoliater, plumper and primer. This is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Best lip primer I have found out of many other ...
customer_reviews.text: Best lip primer I have found out of many other brands tried. Really helps keep lipstick on and lips are left smoother and softer at the end of the day. I want my lipstick to have staying power and most brands are way too slick and creamy, so the color disappears quickly. This product helps to slow that down considerably. If I want ultimate staying power I sometimes apply a Lipstick sealer on top, like the My Lips Are Sealed product.
customer_reviews.author: sandra nied

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. It seems to dry your lips out and due to chap stick application throughout the day for dry lips the color isn't able to stay on as well as it should.
customer_reviews.author: LunaBell

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. This product is a mini and costs as ...
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. This product is a mini and costs as much as the full size product at sephora. No return policy. Make sure you check sizes before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Acrobatrose

customer_reviews.title: Please make  this Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.... sorry they don’t maje ut any more😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but for the money I prefer the lip plumper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much I was willing to pay this exorbitant price as I cannot find it anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: patricia clairwood

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well. Lipstick still feathers after about an hour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and really works at keeping lipstick in place.
customer_reviews.author: T.Allen

customer_reviews.title: Pls make 2 faced lip insurance AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I've ever used in my life to keep lipsticks from feathering. Now they stopped making it. I'm sick about it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This primer goes on very sticky. Dries and feels like glue drying and then feels waxy. Did not like it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ward

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice texture, not super chalky like others I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep lipstick in its place! It has a nice texture, not super chalky like others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: LTurner

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced Lip Insurance is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product as I love may of TOO FACED products! Gives my lipstick/liner/gloss staying power! I've had this product for about 2 months now & it's still going strong. Would definitely be purchasing this product again, as well as recommending it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Vltaylor

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it helps my liquid lipsticks last all day. My only qualm is that it dries white if not covered entirely by color. It's an easy fix, mostly inconvenient when you're on the go and don't notice..
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stanczak

customer_reviews.title: Lip Insurance
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Keeps my lip color All night w/o feathering or having to reapply!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna R Von Eps

customer_reviews.title: Questionable.........
customer_reviews.text: Is supposed to hold Melted Lipstick on for a long time. I have not had those results as of yet. Still trying this product..
customer_reviews.author: Terry N.

customer_reviews.title: It's pricey. I think it works. Especially with ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey. I think it works. Especially with a lip stain aww that will stay on for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mizkayzee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My lipstick stays on much of the morning, controls feathering and bleeding. However, it is very expensive for such as small amout.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rhine

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a tiny sample size and not the full .15 ounce size as described. You can't return it either. This was for the full size price!
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Really works, but...
customer_reviews.text: This product really keeps lipstick from disappearing after a short time, and also keeps it from that awful feathering look. However, I am under the impression that you have to wait for it to dry on your lips before applying your regular lipstick. That delays finishing up. Also, once it dries, it actually makes your lips feel dry and also feel that there are "pieces" of the product that don't belong on your lips. Perhaps I am applying too much of the product, so I will try using less. At any rate, it does what it says it will do -- keep your lipstick on your lips -- so I will keep trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Wiener

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: This lip stick is fantastic. it has improved on my lines and flakes on my lips. Will be buying more of this product.
customer_reviews.author: MEF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I have found that works.
customer_reviews.author: dmccluer

customer_reviews.title: Lip Insurance
customer_reviews.text: This is lip insurance and the best product! I couldn't find it but thank heavens Amazon had it. It prevents my lipstick from feathering (I'm 71) and it protects my lipstick much better. This is my third one but it does last a long time and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann Liljenberg

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I noticed a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I think it helped my lipstick not feather but I am not sure if it makes a huge difference because I used matted lipstick by Nars and that by itself helps
customer_reviews.author: Janice M. Boughton

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed. I would not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This product does not keep your lipstick from running. I was disappointed. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 43 year old woman so those fine little wrinkles around the lips have appeared. I have tried numerous products to help stop my lipstick from feathering. Finally, finally....I have found a product that works. I literally threw away several items last night that didn't work. My lipstick stays put for hours and even looked good after meals/cocktails. This product is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Vititow

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, Smooth, Lasting
customer_reviews.text: This lip primer makes lipstick stay longer. It goes on smoothly and feels moisturizing. It does take a few minutes to dry and gives better results when completely dried so give it 1 or 2 minutes to dry completely before applying lipstick. It has a matte tone to it and looks creamy. The applicator is easy to use even on the lip line. Great primer that even makes lips feel hydrated so the lipstick looks even more smooth and lasting. Use a single application of Too Faced Lip Insurance and top it with lip liner and lipstick of your choice and you get long-lasting lipstick for the whole night.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Online Consumer

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: This puts a white cast on your lips. I had expected it would fill my lip lines and keep my lipstick on longer but I honestly can't see that it does anything at all. Also, the applicator isn't that great so it's hard to apply just where you want it. I'd pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Durling

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I never had success in wearing lipstick until I came across this. Once I started using it I observed that I could actually keep my lipstick on for 6 hours at a time! That's quite the increase from my prior average of 45 minutes. I definitely feel that it's a worthy investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse BexTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I like every aspect of this product it produces exactly what it tells you it will do. I have found that continued use does increase the size of your lips. A must have in my lip care.
customer_reviews.author: Moie Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great antifeathering product
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product numerous times. It keeps your lipstick from feathering.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Really really good!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised how good this stuff is. It works, when I put it on it looks way professional after I apply lipstick or gloss. Probably a new staple in my collection. I used it with some highly pigmented coloured gloss that has always feathered on my, and it looked amazing! It didn't feather at all and it just looked better. Pretty happy with that!
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Still out to lunch.....
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I see the value in this yet. I love the shadow insurance, but this stuff seems to make the lipstick ball up.
customer_reviews.author: TP1

customer_reviews.title: Soft smooth lips
customer_reviews.text: He does a great job as a primer plus it softens my lips. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: L. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: No gimmicks...works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this product for years and it's never let me down. My old lady lips look like I'm in my 20's! Price is great, easy to use, and way easier to get then going to the mall. Woo woo!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: On to the next....Primer
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't tooo happy with this product. Don't get me wrong, I love Too Faced, but this lip primer seemed to be old and it did not help keep my lipstick on for longer lasting finish or wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: No lipstick product has ever kept lipstick perfect for me. I'd say this does better than the others, but still need to reapply it and lipstick several times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: This is great for moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is great for moisturizing, sealing and priming your lip before applying lipstick or gloss. It dries matte, but not gross matte. Worth the dough.
customer_reviews.author: Storee L. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: primes my lips perfectly for the matted lip paints i wear where flaky lips would be obvious
customer_reviews.author: Jane Doe

customer_reviews.title: it like mattifies the lips
customer_reviews.text: maybe i dont understand? it like mattifies the lips? why would you want that....
customer_reviews.author: EvelynPeachRose

customer_reviews.title: keeps lipstick on longer than without. However, if ...
customer_reviews.text: keeps lipstick on longer than without. However, if reallpyning, you should wipe off old lipstick or the primer applicator picks up whatever color you still have on your lips
customer_reviews.author: Tunamuffin

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, just wait it to dry before applying lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Rhita Searles

customer_reviews.title: Still super iffy
customer_reviews.text: While this product glides on smooth, it doesn't always make my lipstick last longer. It seems to make my lips look like they are peeling. I wait a minute or so for the product to dry and then I add my lipstick, but I am still experimenting with this product. this product is so-so.
customer_reviews.author: Skayy

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to apply. I can't tell if it keeps my lipstick on better or makes it more even--it probably does--and it feels nice on my lips. I like it. Minus one star for price--that's just too much.
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps defining my thin lips and makes putting lipstick on much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Darman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: May have just been older but product was totally dried out at arrival. Going to return
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Lip Insurance
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the product goes on, it's very silky. However, I'm not sure that it makes my lipstick last any longer without me having to touch it up.
customer_reviews.author: Love my Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.
customer_reviews.text: This helps keep my lipstick from bleeding into the cracks. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzz

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it does seem to make your lips a little dry. It does keep your lipstick in place though, so it is worth a little dryness.
customer_reviews.author: NessaP

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life😍
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. My liquid lipstick stays all day without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie Crawford

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Use this under regular lipstick and it really helps your lipstick to stay put and wear much longer. Great for those bright reds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any real benefit of using this - especially for the price. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a miracle worker, but definitely makes my lipstick stay on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does keep your lipstick on a lot linger than normal. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Locust

customer_reviews.title: Awesome primer!
customer_reviews.text: This product provided amazing smoothness and staying power under Hourglass lipstick. An absolute must have for any bright, long wear lip color.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the retail store purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than I expected. I thought it was full sized, instead it was about the size you get in those "free gift with purchase". The product itself (when purchased elsewhere) was great. Loved that one. This seemed rather dry and it was used up within two weeks. But this one? I think it was probably old as the texture was noticeably different that the one I still had.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nongreasy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Light and nongreasy. I can't tell that it prolongs my lipstick though. But keeps my lips moist
customer_reviews.author: Tina Murray

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: Lipstick was not very long-lasting. It may just be me, but I did not like the feel of it by itself or with lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Lip Insurance
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the two low reviews, I guess everyone's experience is different. I love this product and use it daily. I have lips that peel and usually lipstick just bleeds out. Since using this my lips are smoother and at least in my experience the lipstick stays on longer then usual. I tried this as a sample in a Sephora kit and after two days use went out to get a full size. I recommend trying it and see how it works for you. For me, it works great and has become part of my daily makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Gracey Castro

customer_reviews.title: Smudgeeeee
customer_reviews.text: i hate this product!! it will smudge ur lips !! i thought it might be from the lipstick brand, i have tried mac, bobbi brown, makeup for ever and dior, all went the same with this primer.. i hate it, its a total waste of money! if i could rate this with no stars i would have! but amazon made me rate!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: Too Faced Cosmetics Lip Insurance, 0.15-Ounce
product_meta.description: Like Shadow Insurance for your lips, our new lip primer locks down lip color and prevents fading, bleeding and creasing. A unique, creamy formulation applied all over the lips promotes supplenessand glides on smooth for maximum staying power.
feature_bullets: Lip Lockdown: Glosses and lip color won’t feather, fade or transfer even under the most lip challenging conditions.
Dual Benefits: Vitamin E enriched formula pampers lips while unique pigment binders protect lip colors from any pout imperfections.
In True Form: Quick-drying formula guarantees that deep, rich pigments perform at their maximum possible depth.
Ease On: Built in applicator is always prepared with the ideal amount of product for even coverage
Free of parabens, sulfates, dyes and other damaging ingredients.
